articles.title: Delta Air Lines flight had to U-turn over ocean due to fuel imbalance
articles.description: One passenger said in a YouTube video the captain walked down the aisle to look out the window at the wings before saying the plane would turn around.
articles.content:
A Delta Air Lines flight was forced to make a U-turn over the Atlantic Ocean after the pilots discovered there was an issue with the fuel.
Newsweek was the first to report the news.

articles.description: Instagram abruptly scrapped plans to mimic TikTok because Kim and Kylie know something Zuck doesn't: Innovation, not imitation, is the key to success.

articles.title: Why the US is not in a recession even as data shows the economy shrank
